ActivityStream.bodyActivityMyselfAddedToSafe: You linked this device to this account
ActivityStream.bodyExplainMeTrustedSomeone: You trusted @{actor} which means that @{actor} can send you their tokens.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainMeUntrustedSomeone: You untrusted @{actor} which means that you do not accept any tokens from them anymore.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainReceivedUBI: This is your Universal Basic Income, issued as your own personal currency. You receive {rate} per day.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainSecondary: All activities carry a small transaction fee used to maintain the Circles network.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainTrustedBySomeone: @{actor} trusts you. You can send your token to them now.
ActivityStream.bodyExplainUntrustedBySomeone: @{actor} untrusts you which means that they do not accept your token anymore.

Make sure your image is a jpeg or png of maximum 1 MB.

BalanceDisplay.tooltipSharedWalletBalance: This is the shared wallet balance. Shared wallets do not receive basic income.
BalanceDisplay.tooltipYourBalance: Your basic income is issued continuously at the rate of {rate} circles per day.

CriticalError.bodyCriticalErrorDescription: Oh no! Something went wrong. Please reload this page and try again.
CriticalError.bodyCriticalErrorTryAgain: Oh no! Something went wrong while loading your account. Please reload this page and try again.
CriticalError.dialogAreYouSure: Do you really want to reset this wallet? You will not be able to recover without your magic words.

DialogAddMember.dialogBody: Trust is Power. When you add somebody it means that you are sharing the power to send Circles from your shared wallet.
DialogAddMember.dialogBodyCannotAdd: You cannot add another shared wallet as a member of a shared wallet.

DialogBurn.dialogBurnDescription: Are you sure you want to end this session? You will not be able to restore your account unless you have your Magic Words!

DialogTrust.dialogTrustDescription: Trust is Power. When you trust somebody it means that you are sharing the power to issue Circles.
DialogTrust.errorTrust: Something went wrong when you tried to trust @{username} ...

DialogTrustRevoke.dialogRevokeTrustDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke trust in @{username}?
DialogTrustRevoke.errorRevokeTrust: Something went wrong when you tried to untrust @{username} ...

DonationNote.bodyPrimary: Since launching last year the Circles community has grown to 200k users around the globe. Interest in the project led to rapid scaling, which overloaded our servers, and after overhauling our infrastructure we are at the end of our budget.
DonationNote.bodySecondary: We need your support to continue! We need your help to make basic income a reality worldwide! We are looking for committed, regular donors who support bringing Circles to a fully thriving life.
DonationNote.bodyThird: Your donation is crucial! Supports the creation of a basic income for all people, and make sustainable, local economies worldwide.

EditProfile.bodyCancel: If you click cancel all changes you made will be lost.
EditProfile.confirmationMessage: Great! Your profile changes have been saved!
EditProfile.errorNameTaken: Sorry, this name is already taken!
EditProfile.errorImageCapture: Sorry, there was a problem with image capture.
EditProfile.errorSaveChanges: Sorry, there was a problem with saving changes.
EditProfile.errorCompressImage: Sorry, there was a problem with compressing uploaded image
EditProfile.heading: Edit profile
EditProfile.informationText: Here you can change the main information of your Wallet.
EditProfile.informationText2: Your username can have basic characters and numbers (a-z, A-Z, 0-9), and 3-24 characters. No symbols or white-spaces are allowed.
EditProfile.informationText3: Just a reminder. Your privacy is very important to us. We will never share this!
EditProfile.titleCancel: Do you want to save changes to your profile?

ErrorCodes.CoreErrorInsufficientFunds: Please send some Circles to this account if you want to perform any transaction
ErrorCodes.CoreErrorSafeNotFound: Could not find Safe with address ${safeAddress}. Please try again later
ErrorCodes.GeneralErrorMessage: Please try with different values or refresh page or try again later
ErrorCodes.ErrorTokenNotDeployed: Something went wrong! We could not create your wallet. Please reset your account.

ExportStatement.exportInfoText: Your wallet statement will be downloaded in CSV format.
ExportStatement.exportHelper: You can only export periods up to one year ago.

Login.bodyEnterYourSeedPhrase: Enter your magic words below to restore your wallet:
Login.errorRestoreFailedUnknown: Could not restore account due to an unknown error.
Login.errorRestoreFailedUnknownSafe: The account you tried to restore is not registered.

NotFound.bodyNotFound: Ouch. We could not find the requested page. Are you sure it's the right address?

Onboarding.bodyAboutSeedPhraseP1: Magic words are a set of words that contain all the information about your wallet, including your Circles. It's like a secret code used to access your account.
Onboarding.bodyAboutSeedPhraseP2: It is important to keep your magic words secret and safe. If someone has access to your magic words, they can access your private account.
Onboarding.bodyAboutSeedPhraseP3: Save them in a private place that you can access. If you lose them, not even the Circles team can recover it.
Onboarding.bodyAvatar: Your photo is how your friends can search for you on the Circles App.
Onboarding.bodySaveSeedPhraseHelper: Save it in a place where only you can access it. If you lose it, not even the Circles Team can recover it.
Onboarding.bodySecureWalletP1A: Don’t risk losing your account. Protect your wallet by saving your
Onboarding.bodySecureWalletP2: This is the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app, or get a new device.
Onboarding.bodySeedPhrase: This is your account password. You can use this to login into your account on other devices.
Onboarding.bodySeedPhraseChallenge: Please enter word {wordIndex} in your magic words:
Onboarding.bodyUsername: Your username is how your friends can search for you on the Circles App.
Onboarding.bodyGuidelinesUsername: Only basic characters and numbers (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) are allowed, no symbols or whitespace, 3-24 characters.
Onboarding.errorSignup: A server error occurred during sign up: {errorMessage}
Onboarding.headingSaveSeedPhraseHelper: Where to store your magic words
Onboarding.headingSeedPhraseChallenge: Did you save your Magic Words?
Onboarding.linkHelperSaveSeedPhrase: Need tips on where to save it?
Onboarding.listItemSaveSeedPhraseHelper4: Hand write, and put somewhere safe
Onboarding.successOnboardingComplete: Your account was successfully created! Welcome!

OnboardingOrganization.bodyPrefund: Every activity in the Circles system requires a small maintenance fee. Send 1 or more Circles to your new wallet to finish setup.
OnboardingOrganization.bodyUsername: Your wallet name is how your friends can search for you on the Circles App. We recommend you to name your Shared Wallet after your Organization's name.
OnboardingOrganization.formPrefundInvalid: This amount is higher than your current token balance
OnboardingOrganization.successOnboardingComplete: Your shared wallet was successfully created! You can start inviting other members now.

OrganizationMembersAdd.errorAddedMember: Something went wrong, @{username} could not be added to the shared wallet

bodyMutualFriends.other: You share {count} mutually trusted connections with @{username}

SeedPhrase.bodyDescription: Print this and store it safely:

bodyAmountTooHigh.one: You can currently only send a maximum of {count} Circles to @{username}.
bodyAmountTooHigh.other: You can currently only send a maximum of {count} Circles to @{username}.
bodyAmountTooHigh.zero: You can currently not send anything to @{username} which means that there is no trust path between you.

SendConfirm.errorMessageCannotBeCalculated: Maximum amount cannot be calculated at this time.
SendConfirm.errorMessageTransferInvalid: Could not transfer Circles as it is invalid.
SendConfirm.errorMessageTransferNotFound: The transaction to @{username} could not be completed due to the trust paths. Try smaller amounts.
SendConfirm.errorMessageTransferTooComplex: Could not transfer Circles as there are too many hops required to send Circles to @{username}. Consider sending a smaller amount and ask @{username} to trust you directly to make this transfer easier.
SendConfirm.errorMessageTransferUnknown: Could not transfer Circles. Something went wrong!
SendConfirm.tooltipMaxFlow: This is the current maximum amount of Circles you can send in the trust network to @{username}
SendConfirm.transferringCirclesInfo: Transferring Circles through the network. This may take a few minutes.

Share.shareText: Hey! Check out my Circles UBI profile!

ShareBox.headingShowYourQR: Show your QR code or profile to others to receive trust.

TextVerification.noteInvalid:
You cannot write special symbols like {}
^ or more than 100 characters.

Tokens.descriptionTokens: All circles you hold were originally issued as someone's basic income. These users are the original issuers of the circles you hold. Each of these circles can be sent directly to other wallets that trust these users.

TransferInfoBalanceCard.tooltipTotalBalance: This is the current balance of all Circles you have on your account

TutorialOnboarding.bodyBuildYourOwnEconomy: Circles has no central leadership, so it’s yours to create with. You can invite friends and local businesses to Circles to support an alternative economy.
TutorialOnboarding.bodyUnconditionalIncome: Circles is designed similar to a basic income. Because it is people-powered, it is based on trust. To receive your basic income, three people already trusted in the Circles system must trust your profile. This way you are unconditionally issued Circles tokens on a regular basis.
TutorialOnboarding.bodyWebOfTrust: You can spend Circles with people who you trust. The more connected your community is, the more valuable your Circles become.

TutorialOrganization.slideBody1: With a Shared Wallet you can pull your individual Circles together and organize joint projects with the people that you trust. This wallet will not receive a basic income.
TutorialOrganization.slideBody2: Organizations, families, communities, and individuals can use these wallets to hold Circles in common, or keep track of a personal business.
TutorialOrganization.slideBody3: As a group you can trust people in order to accept their Circles. You can also send and receive Circles from other groups.
TutorialOrganization.slideBody3Link: Learn more on how to organize with other groups.

UBI.infoUbiPayoutReceived:
You just received your UBI of
{payout}circles for the month!

Validation.bodyDoNotReset: Do not reset your browser local storage or you will need to recover your data with your magic words.
Validation.bodyTrustDescriptionEmphasize: three people must trust your profile.
Validation.tooltipLeftTrustConnections: You need {connections} more trust connections before you can create your account

ValidationLock.bodyThisMayTakeMinutes: Keep your wallet open! Your wallet is now being created on the blockchain. This process is delicate and might take some minutes. It is important that you do not close or refresh your browser until this finishes. Otherwise your wallet creation will crash, and you will have to start from scratch.

ValidationShare.headingShowYourQR: Show your QR code or profile to others to receive trust.
ValidationShare.shareText: Hey! Check out my Circles profile!

ValidationStatus.bodyReadyForDeployment: Your account is ready now, click the button below to create it:
